website_summaries.verdict: Not the most powerful laptop in the ASUS lineup, but its beautiful 15.6-inch wide view display is definitely going to grab your attention.
pros: Nice price point for a laptop with such a large screen
Has both an HDD and SSD for storage
Extremely thin design that you can carry anywhere

customer_reviews.title: touch pad ruined it for me
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this for watching videos/typing papers/ browsing internet. The touch pad is so bad. When ever I use two fingers to scroll up or down, it works like 30% of the time. It was fine at first, but around 30 days in my touch pad started having this problem. Most of my time is browsing web pages and I can't even use the two finger scroll. Its also really easy to do other multi finer gestures by accident. My $200 chromebook has lasted 2 years and has a better touch pad. It's kinda sad because other than that I really like this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: This laptop rocks
customer_reviews.text: not touchscreen , no idea why it ask me to review that. Anyways best laptop ever for the price i actually know a lot about laptop and believe me for school and work related this laptop rocks
customer_reviews.author: Angel Soler

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a computer geek, but I know what I like in laptops. And there is nothing I dislike about this one. Runs smooth, holds the charge, gorgeous color, and super lightweight. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: m.a.miller

customer_reviews.title: Battery wont charge - apparently an issue ASUS has known about for a while
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Sept 2019. After 6 weeks battery wont charge and finally the laptop goes dead. Purchased a replacement charger and still wont charge. Now have the hassle of replacement and losing my data. Do a quick internet search for "asus wont charge" and you will see this is a longstanding issue (since at least 2018). Avoid the problems and try a different manufacturer. It may cost a little more, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: BuysTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Just got the laptop already love it. Got it in the peacock blue. Super easy to set up love the c port so I can plug in my phone charger. The screen looks amazing and is perfect for Netflix or Hulu. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rawa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color, Fast Machine, Big Size
customer_reviews.text: This was the best investment I've done for myself. It's so fast, crisp and perfect for what I use it for. I don't game on this, but I love it and it starts up so ridiculously fast I think it is quicker than my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: afoxscreamitout

customer_reviews.title: Screen and keyboard issue
customer_reviews.text: Laptop worked great the first day. Super fast, nice color, good screen size. I'm not sure if its something I did or if I was just unlucky and received a defective product, but the screen and keyboard will not work unless its in a specific orientation. It seems as though there is a short in the cable that connects the screen and keyboard to the board but I haven't had the chance to take it apart to determine the issue. I requested a replacement so hopefully the second one will show up in working order.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reid

customer_reviews.title: Very nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely laptop. It doesn't have a touch screen option though, but that isn't a detriment. It runs smoothly, and the colors are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Afia B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for LIGHT work. Frick mccafe.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but struggles with anything other than very light work, McCafe or whatever can suck me dry that crap annoying as hell. Battery life SUPER short. Would be a good 400 dollar computer.
customer_reviews.author: GabeVGThompson

customer_reviews.title: color not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I just received it but was disappointed by the fact that the blue color did not come to me as expected. The touchpad color does not match at all. I am returning it and purchasing a different color. I did try to contact both asus and amazon about this issue before going through with the return as they said that nothing could be done about it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I got the bluish color for my boyfriend. This little laptop is fast and runs all the games he uses with ease. Closes out of games fast. Screen is bright and a good size. The bluish color of the laptop is a great color. Such a great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!! Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This computer is not worth the money. It is a piece of plastic and is less effective than my $300 laptop. Whenever I pause a YouTube video the screen freezes up and turns green. The mouse has completely stopped working on this laptop and highlights everything and won't move. I've attached 2 photos.
customer_reviews.author: adilah y.

customer_reviews.title: Fan very loud
customer_reviews.text: Got the product earlier than expected. The only issue is when the fan turns on, it is extremely loud. As if it is off balance and rubbing against another part inside of the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lost keyboard key
customer_reviews.text: I love my new laptop but I have had it maybe a few months and one of my keys has already come off. I had my other laptop for six years and not one lost a key on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: great pc for its price
customer_reviews.text: design is good screen is great quality and the processor handle any light-medium editing only one issue is the 8 ram which is 6 in real its not enough if it was like 12 it should get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: b.beckman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Update to amd
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy i mony time think before purchase amd processor laptop but anything excellent i very happy its very fast and cold processor
customer_reviews.author: Dieter

customer_reviews.title: AMD Quad Core R5-3500U
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy it its good processor i buy it to my wife she like it
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang

product_meta.title: ASUS VivoBook 15 Thin and Light Laptop, 15.6” Full HD, AMD Quad Core R5-3500U CPU, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD, AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics, Windows 10 Home, F512DA-EB55-BL, Peacock Blue
product_meta.description: The ASUS VivoBook F512DA-EB55-BL is the perfect combination of performance and function. The F512DA is a Windows 10 laptop powered by an AMD Quad Core R5-3500U Processor, 8GB DDR4 RAM, and ASUS NanoEdge display technology. It's the ideal laptop for daily computing and entertainment.
feature_bullets: Powerful AMD Quad Core r5-3500u Processor (Up to 3. 6 GHz)
14. 1” wide, 0. 7” thin and portable footprint with NanoEdge bezel for a stunning 88% screen-to-body ratio
15. 6” anti-glare full HD Wide view display with ASUS splendid software enhancement
8GB DDR4 RAM; 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD; Windows 10 Home
Ergonomic chiclet backlit keyboard with fingerprint sensor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
